description:
Ayesa is a Spanish multinational company that offers engineering, technology and consulting services. It was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Seville, Spain.

Ayesa operates in more than 20 countries and has a workforce of more than 12,000 employees.

Ayesa is looking for a Data Scientist in the USA to work in projects for an important Electricity Company.

About the role

As a Data Scientist, you will be responsible for using data to drive business decisions. You will work with a team of engineers, product managers, and other data scientists to collect, analyze, and interpret data. You will also build and deploy machine learning models to improve our products and services.

Responsibilities
• Collect and clean data from a variety of sources
• Analyze data using statistical and machine learning techniques
• Build and deploy machine learning and forecasting models
• Communicate findings to stakeholders
• Stay up-to-date on the latest data science trends

Qualifications
• Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Machine Learning, AI or a related field
• 3+ years of experience in data science
• Strong programming skills in Python, Java in microservices architecture
• High mathematical knowledge in algebra, predictive, statistical and algorithmic calculations.
• Experience with machine learning libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch
• Experience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP
• Excellent communication and presentation skills

Benefits
• Competitive salary and benefits
• Opportunity to work on cutting-edge data science projects
• Collaborative and supportive work environment
• Chance to make a real impact on the company and its customers
